title: Buy Alert: 3 Tech Stocks Sitting in the Sweet Spot
text: Some tech stocks give investors the opportunity to earn meaningful long-term returns. These stocks can outperform the market over several years due to their compelling opportunities and massive runways.

title: Wall Street Favorites: 3 Growth Stocks With Strong Buy Ratings for January 2024
text: Wall Street analysts spend their entire careers analyzing stocks and determining which equities have potential. Detailed research from these analysts can help investors save time and generate good returns from their portfolios.

title: Future Fortunes: 7 Stocks in Cutting-Edge Industries to Buy Now
text: Your money won't do much good sitting in your bank account because of dismal rates on savings accounts. While there is a benefit to using certificates of deposit to get higher rates, the stock market offers more exciting returns.

title: US Senate panel urges Treasury Dept to make tech firms comply with sanctions
text: The U.S. Treasury Department should do more to ensure that major tech firms, including Meta Platforms and Alphabet , comply with sanctions against foreign firms that advertise on their platforms, a top lawmaker said on Monday.

title: Alphabet, Meta ad sales in Q4 unlikely to reflect gen AI investments
text: Despite the buzz over generative artificial intelligence last year, the technology's impact on the advertising business of Alphabet and Meta Platforms is likely to be muted when the companies report fourth-quarter results this week, though investors are mapping out its future potential.

title: Alphabet's advertising and stock are on a roll, but antitrust worries linger
text: Google parent Alphabet Inc.'s stock has been on a tear, achieving a record all-time high last week as it rumbles toward projected bang-up results for the quarter on Tuesday.

title: GOOG Stock Warning: The One Thing That Could Threaten Alphabet's Dominance
text: Google parent Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOGL ,NASDAQ: GOOG ) stock has been a phenomenal investment over the past decade returning double the S&P 500 on the back of search. Although cloud services are gaining more attention, advertising runs Alphabet.

title: Magnificent 7 Stocks: Are These Leading Growth Names Overheated, Or Are They Just Getting Started?

title: Q4 Earnings Bets: 3 Stocks to Buy BEFORE the Reports Roll In
text: The first earnings season of 2024 is in full swing, and while it has given investors a lot of hope and optimism, it has also disappointed in a few industries. Several companies are set to report results this month, so there will be heavy movement in the stock market in the coming weeks.

title: Alphabet Stock Alert: Buy GOOG for Big AI Gains

title: Google Earnings Outlook: AI Uncertainty, Cloud, Capital Spending, YouTube

title: Billionaire Investor David Tepper Has 47% of His Portfolio Invested in 5 Superb Artificial Intelligence (AI) Growth Stocks
text: David Tepper has been called "arguably the greatest hedge fund manager of his generation." More than 47% of Appaloosa Management's holdings are invested in five AI stocks.

title: Will Alphabet Be Worth More Than Microsoft by 2030?
text: Microsoft is now nearly 60% more valuable than Alphabet. Alphabet seems to be falling behind in the cloud and AI markets.
